title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 280.1 - Scope of part
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 280.1 - Scope of part

State Regulations

This Part is intended to establish the procedure for
determinations pursuant to section 206 of the State Administrative Procedure

Act concerning whether compliance with a Federal requirement will be accepted
as compliance with a similar State requirement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
280.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
